name: Mana Force
description:
XBOX CONTROLLER REQUIRED TO PLAY.

Mana Force is a top-down 3d action game where the objective is to use the boss's abilities against them.

Credits

Dominik Lussier-Marcotte - Game Design, Digital Art, Modeling, VFX
Viktor Briceno - Game Design, Programming
Luis Boscan -Game Design, Programming

Mana Force is a prototype game made for a Dawson College class.
